name: union_sql_queries
description: Combine results of two SQL SELECT queries using a set operation like UNION, INTERSECT, or EXCEPT. Supports saving results to file or temporary table.

database_path.description: Path to the SQLite database file.

operator.description: SQL set operator used to combine the two queries. Must be one of: UNION, UNION ALL, INTERSECT, EXCEPT.

save_to_file.description: Optional file path (.csv or .xlsx) to save the combined query result.

create_temp_table.description: Optional name of the temporary table to store the combined query result.
